title: Todd McKenney reveals the bizarre way he is preparing for his theatre return as Lord Farquaad
text:
Australian theatre legend Todd McKenney will return to the stage as movie villain Lord Farquaad in Shrek The Musical.

And on Wednesday, the Real Dirty Dancing host revealed that getting ready to play the pint-sized 'evil lord' on stage was more challenging than he ever imagined.

Appearing on Seven's The Morning Show, he surrpised the hosts by explaining: 'I have to do all the dialogue on my knees.'

Todd McKenney revealed the bizarre way he is getting ready for his theatre return as Lord Farquaad in upcoming production, Shrek The Musical

The first film in the children's series Shrek was released in 2001, with Lord Farquaad originally voiced by American actor and musician John Lithgow.

Todd said he spends up to an hour in costume running errands around the house to 'keep those muscles working'.

'I do one hour a day in my costume around the house, just doing normal things like letting the dogs out or taking the rubbish out, I do it on my knees,' he continued.

'I have to do all the dialogue on my knees,' he spoke on The Morning Show

'It's not just your knees, it's your neck and back,' he concluded.

Todd will be joined by Australian singer Marcia Hines (to play dragon) and Packed to The Rafters star Ben Mingay as Shrek.

The musical will also see theatre actress Lucy Durack play the lead of Princess Fiona.

Todd then revealed he spends up to an hour in costume running errands around the house to 'keep those muscles working'

Speaking out about the show, he said: 'What I love about Shrek The Musical is it works on two levels - there's stuff that goes can lead over the kid's head, aimed at adults and it's fun for everyone.'

Earlier this month, he took to his Instagram page to announce the news, 'OMG - Excited!!! I'm Lord Farquaad - better brush up on my 'evil' lord routine! It's a brilliant role and very funny. I am super duper excited!' he wrote.

Shrek The Musical kicks off in Sydney in January 2020 before moving to Melbourne and Brisbane.
description: Australian theatre legend Todd McKenney will return to the stage as movie villain Lord Farquaad in Shrek The Musical.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
